Rework

Basscss is built with Rework with these dependencies: Rework NPM, Rework Custom Media, Rework Vars, Rework Plugin Colors, and Rework Calc. Alternatively, you can customize and use the compiled basscss.css as-is, or import it in a Sass project by renaming the file.

Organization

Basscss is organized according to four high-level categories. These are conceptually based on smart defaults, basic layout considerations, volatility, and cohesion.

  • Base Elements
  • Immutable Utilities
  • Layout Modules
  • Color
